event.title: came to the area from North Carolina in 1849

data.event: These two men came to the area from North Carolina in 1849 and donated the majority of land where Middleton is today.

event.title: donated the majority of land where Middleton is today

data.event: These two men came to the area from North Carolina in 1849 and donated the majority of land where Middleton is today.
Following the expansion of the Memphis and Charleston Railroad and the construction of a railroad depot, Middleton was chartered in 1850.
